page.title: 07BUSINESS IN CHALFORD
page.content: There are several factories in the Chalford Vale.There is one which makes handcrafted furniture and has made chairs for the strongest man in Europe and the fattest Member of Parliament. In Chalford Hill there is the head office of an engineering company.There are also several building companies which employ small numbers of local workers.In the valley there is a small industrial estate.There are also several small garages which repair vehicles,one of them sells petrol as well.This is not an area that provides much employment so most people travel to work in the towns and cities beyond Chalford,like Gloucester and Stroud. This area is within reasonable reach of all the main towns in the South-West,some people even commute to London by train from Stroud.
